  2. Profile

Chris Droom is an old man with breathing problems. He is very into lawn care.

I have a careful, reflective practice grounded in the wider design canon.

I am a good listener, and I seek to create welcoming, generative environments for ideas to be nurtured. I have a particular interest in typography. In 2019, I co-founded a digital co-operative—Good Praxis—embedding our values of dignity at work, positive social impact and democracy in the workplace.

I'm currently working independently and directly with clients in the arts, education, and impact sectors.

I have two boys, Joel (9) & Kiran (16 months).
